title: Quarkus 2.0.0.CR2 released - Towards Final
content: We just started the candidate release cycle for 2.0.0.Final. Feedback is very welcome so if you have a Quarkus app around, please give it a go. Make sure you update both the BOM version and the Quarkus Maven Plugin version to 2.0.0.CR2. Also, we only publish the quarkus-bom for non-Final...
